name: through2
description: A tiny wrapper around Node.js streams.Transform (Streams2/3) to avoid explicit subclassing noise

4.0.2.name: through2
4.0.2.description: A tiny wrapper around Node.js streams.Transform (Streams2/3) to avoid explicit subclassing noise

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.coverage: c8 --reporter=text --reporter=html mocha test/test.js && npx st -d coverage -p 8888
